offset.comment: The space that the Tooltip's caret is offset from the edge.

background-color.comment: The background color for the tooltip caret.

width.comment: The width of the tooltip caret.

hover-offset.comment: The surrounding hover area around the trigger when the Tooltip is visible.

border.comment: The border for the tooltip trigger.

background-color.comment: The background color for the tooltip trigger.

padding.comment: The padding for the tooltip trigger.

text-align.comment: The text align for the tooltip trigger.

background-color.comment: The background color for the tooltip.

text-align.comment: The text align for the tooltip.

color.comment: The font color for the tooltip.

weight.comment: The font weight for the tooltip.

size.comment: The font size for the tooltip.

border-radius.comment: The border radius for the tooltip.

toggled-icon-background-color.comment: The background color for the tooltip icon while toggled.

max-width.comment: The max-width of the tooltip. This is used as a fallback if the preferred width is invalid, e.g. for IE 11

preferred-width.comment: The preferred width of the tooltip.

transition.comment: The transition applied to the tooltip.

animation-offset.comment: The distance the tooltip should move during its animation.
